title: Allied Cycle Works & Colin Strickland team up on Grax – Gravel Wax chain lube
content:
These days, it seems like everyone has their own idea of what makes the fastest chain lube. That includes the crew over at Allied Cycle Works. What does a carbon bicycle manufacturer know about chain lube? Well, after their Able gravel frame was released in 2019, the bike was raced to victory in both men’s […]

The post Allied Cycle Works & Colin Strickland team up on Grax – Gravel Wax chain lube appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
